QuestData.Title: The Best Prevention
QuestData.Description: If you've brought the High Exarch back to us, you are a welcome ally indeed.$b$bMore is needed of you. You see our soldiers out there, fighting against all odds? Defend them. Slay the enemy.$b$bStrong words for a priest, perhaps, but every dead man'ari is one less blade at our throats.$b$bShow them that the Light protects its chosen even as it scorches the unfaithful.$b$bWhen you are finished, seek out Y'mera. She will have fewer troops, and more need of your abilities.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa attackers in the Shattered Fields.
QuestData.RewardText: You fought well. The Light shines brighter, thanks to your efforts.
